name: alphamountain-feed
label: alphaMountain Feed
description: The AlphaMountain feed connector facilitates seamless integration with AlphaMountain's data sources, providing access to real-time and historical data on domain popularity, cybersecurity insights, risk scores and relevant content categorization and more.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Specify the Rest API feed endpoint URL of the alphaMountain server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the Rest API feed endpoint URL of the alphaMountain server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.tooltip: Specify the API key to access the alphaMountain Rest API feed endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.description: Specify the API key to access the alphaMountain Rest API feed endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.

operations.title: Get Indicators
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all indicators from alphaMountain Feed. You can also filter the indicators retrieved from alphaMountain Feed based on the filter you have specified

parameters.title: Start Date
parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Specify the date time for the beginning of the feed record to fetch. Due to internal synchronization between servers, recent record timestamps may be delayed by up to six hours and thus the latest timestamp used should be now() - '6 hours'
parameters.tooltip: Specify the date time for the beginning of the feed record to fetch. Due to internal synchronization between servers, recent record timestamps may be delayed by up to six hours and thus the latest timestamp used should be now() - '6 hours'

parameters.title: Flags
parameters.name: flags
parameters.description: Specify the list of flags to exclude certain types of entries from the results. Possible values include "Exclude IP","Exclude Host","Exclude Path","Exclude Dead".
parameters.tooltip: Specify the list of flags to exclude certain types of entries from the results. Possible values include "Exclude IP","Exclude Host","Exclude Path","Exclude Dead".

parameters.title: Minimum Risk
parameters.name: risk_min
parameters.description: Specify a minimum risk score to include in the feed. Defaults to license entitlements
parameters.tooltip: Specify a minimum risk score to include in the feed. Defaults to license entitlements

parameters.title: Maximum Risk
parameters.name: risk_min
parameters.description: Specify a maximum risk score to include in the feed. Defaults to license entitlements
parameters.tooltip: Specify a maximum risk score to include in the feed. Defaults to license entitlements

parameters.title: Include Categories
parameters.name: include_categories
parameters.description: If you check this option, it will fetch newly classified and revalidated categorizations for retrieved feed indicators.
parameters.tooltip: If you check this option, it will fetch newly classified and revalidated categorizations for retrieved feed indicators

true.title: Categories
true.name: categories
true.description: Specify a only list of categories to include in the returned feed. Defaults to license entitlements
true.tooltip: Specify a only list of categories to include in the returned feed. Defaults to license entitlements

parameters.title: Include Popularity
parameters.name: include_popularity
parameters.description: If you check this option, it will fetch host popularity rankings for retrieved feed indicators.
parameters.tooltip: If you check this option, it will fetch host popularity rankings for retrieved feed indicators

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify a limit on the number of records returned. Defaults to license entitlements
parameters.tooltip: Specify a limit on the number of records returned. Defaults to license entitlements

operations.title: Get Available Categories
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all available categories for urls
